all in.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to describe the total cost of something, or the total amount of money charged for something
all in.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The hourly rate is £20 all in.
all-in deals to Australia and New Zealand
all in.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an all-in rate or price is one that includes all services, parts etc, with no additional costs
all in.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: For an all-in price of £990, investors get an annual subscription as well as the hardware and software required.
